roleset.name: hate strongly
roleset.note: DETEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'detest' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.2, Framenet entry Experiencer subj. (from detest.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pretty simple
example.text: But small business, which [*T*-1] generally detests government-mandated benefits, has taken note of the growing number of close votes.

roleset.name: worthy of being hated
roleset.note: DETESTABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, relation to 'detest'. (from detestable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Post a lousy photo , then bark around like a berserk dog , and then support yourself and exasperate 1.3 billion Chinese people , you American henchman are detestable to the point of being a bit cute !
example.arg: to the point of being a bit cute
